Class Simplabs::ReportsAsSparkline::ReportCache
In: lib/simplabs/reports_as_sparkline/report_cache.rb
Parent: ActiveRecord::Base

The ReportCache class is a regular ActiveRecord model and represents cached results for single reporting periods (table name is reports_as_sparkline_cache) ReportCache instances are identified by the combination of model_name, report_name, grouping, aggregation, reporting_period, run_limit

[Validate]
